snippet: The government faces questions about the decision to spare Lehman Brothers executives. | The owners of Neiman Marcus are near a deal to sell the luxury retailer. | Verizon paid dearly for waiting to acquire Vodafone’s stake in its wireless venture....
abstract: The government faces questions about the decision to spare Lehman Brothers executives. | The owners of Neiman Marcus are near a deal to sell the luxury retailer. | Verizon paid dearly for waiting to acquire Vodafone’s stake in its wireless venture. | Harvard Business School conducted a two-year experiment to foster female success.

headline.main: How the S.E.C. Threw In the Towel on Lehman
